name: zsscn

body.origin:
|- wss(cz, cc)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
-| diffsc(hs0, cz)
-| diffsc(hs0, cc)
body.pretty:
⊢ ℤ ⊆ ℂ
⊣ (hs0 ∈ ℤ → hs0 ∈ ℂ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℤ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℂ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cz, cc)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
-| diffsc(hs0, cz)
-| diffsc(hs0, cc)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ℤ ⊆ ℂ
⊣ (hs0 ∈ ℤ → hs0 ∈ ℂ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℤ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℂ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cz, cc)
-| diffsc(hs0, cz)
-| diffsc(hs0, cc)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ℤ ⊆ ℂ
⊣ d(hs0, ℤ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℂ)

comment: The integers are a subset of the complex numbers. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2004.)
